code: export var getSecureData=function getSecureData(key){try{var value=localStorage.getItem(key);return value;}catch(error){console.log("Error in getSecureData",error);throw new Error(error.message);}};export var setSecureData=function setSecureData(key,value){try{localStorage.setItem(key,value);}catch(error){console.log("Error in setSecureData",error);throw new Error(error.message);}};
